name: cutty-unified
description: Unified Cloudflare Workers application for Cutty - serves both frontend and backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:worker
scripts.build:frontend: cd ../app/frontend && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../../unified-worker/public/
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && wrangler deploy --env staging
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && wrangler deploy --env production

author: Cutty Team
